card.text: Devour 3

card.name: Tidehollow Sculler
card.text: When Tidehollow Sculler enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Tidehollow Sculler leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Titanic Ultimatum
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +5/+5 and gain first strike, lifelink, and trample.

card.name: Topan Ascetic
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Topan Ascetic gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Tortoise Formation
card.text: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn.

card.name: Undead Leotau
card.text: {R}: Undead Leotau gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{B}

card.name: Vectis Silencers
card.text: {2}{B}: Vectis Silencers gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Vein Drinker
card.text: Flying {R}, {T}: Vein Drinker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Vein Drinker. Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vein Drinker this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vein Drinker.

card.name: Viashino Skeleton
card.text: {1}{B}, Discard a card: Regenerate Viashino Skeleton.

card.name: Vicious Shadows
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, you may have Vicious Shadows deal damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

card.name: Violent Ultimatum
card.text: Destroy three target permanents.

card.name: Viscera Dragger
card.text: Cycling {2} Unearth {1}{B}

card.name: Vithian Stinger
card.text: {T}: Vithian Stinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Unearth {1}{R}

card.name: Volcanic Submersion
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land. Cycling {2}

card.name: Welkin Guide
card.text: Flying When Welkin Guide enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Where Ancients Tread
card.text: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Where Ancients Tread deal 5 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Wild Nacatl
card.text: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.

card.name: Windwright Mage
card.text: Lifelink Windwright Mage has flying as long as an artifact card is in your graveyard.

card.name: Yoked Plowbeast
card.text: Cycling {2}
